name: Brawl of the Meh
description:
WARNING ALPHA PROTOTYPE

Fight each other with different weapons in a one-color world. Kill your enemies and come out on top.

 -kill each other with different weapons

 -dodge enemies attacks -use your surrounding to get the high ground

Shoot them, nuke them or throw them off the platform... The choice is yours.

 Controls: -

 

Credits: 

 Nyan P (https://www.artstation.com/nyanacreation )  = Game Artist

 Void [https://karlokoelewijn.wordpress.com/] = Game Developer

Sami [https://samibenlabchir.wordpress.com/] = Game Developer
